page.title: 12BON-ACCORD BATHS 1
page.content: The Bon-Accord Baths or "Uptown Baths" as they are known locally are situated in Justice Mill Lane,just behind Union Street. Recently the District Council tentatively suggested closing them down because of the expense involved in running them but a public outcry has prevented this. The pool is popular with teenagers; many go regularly at the reasonable cost of 25p on weekdays and 45p at weekends.However with a cafeteria on the premises they usually end up with spending more.They also attend with their schools as several of the Aberdeen schools don't have their own pool. The pool is well used,with special times for ladies,toddlers and senior citizens.
